results.abstract: Members of crew of Mir space station are trying to find leak in its damaged cooling system; spokesman says that toxic fumes recently appeared inside 11-year-old station, but that three-man crew is not in danger (S)
results.snippet: The members of the crew of the Mir space station are trying to find a leak in its damaged cooling system, a Russian mission control spokesman said today.     The spokesman said that toxic fumes had recently appeared inside the 11-year-old station but...
results.lead_paragraph: The members of the crew of the Mir space station are trying to find a leak in its damaged cooling system, a Russian mission control spokesman said today. The spokesman said that toxic fumes had recently appeared inside the 11-year-old station but said that the three-man crew was not in danger.
